EmailTemplate.name: 3Mar12Web:ConsultingRates.Invite1
EmailTemplate.subject: Need help calculating your consulting rate?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Maddam}},
Join me on {{my.date2:default=edit me}} to learn how to calculate your bill rate -- or hourly rate for services. In this hour-long webinar, you will see an overview of the possible approaches to calculating your bill rate. Then, you will learn step-by-step directions on the cost-based pricing method.
{{my.title:default=edit me}} also will include the story of a real-life MBO associate's approach to calculating the right personal rate.
Join us on {{my.date2:default=edit me}}, from 12:30-1:30 pm EST.
Register today - http://info.mbopartners.com/Calculating-Bill-Rate.html
I look forward to discussing this topic further with you.
Regards,
{{my.advisor:default=Steve}}
